title: CBRN Awareness - Level 1
description: Foundation awareness training for Chemical, Biological, Radiological and Nuclear threats. Generated by NOVA autonomous DSAT cycle.
body: This course covers the fundamental awareness requirements for CBRN threats as identified through DSAT analysis of the Statement of Role.

_buttons._disabledAriaLabel: This button is disabled at the moment

_accessibilityInstructions.touch: Usage instructions. Use swipe left for next. Use swipe right for previous. Use a double tap to select. Use a two finger slide up to go to the top of the page.
_accessibilityInstructions.notouch: Usage instructions. Use tab for next. Use shift tab for previous. Use enter to select. Use escape to go to the top of the page.
_accessibilityInstructions.ipad: Usage instructions for iPad. Use swipe left for next. Use swipe right for previous. Use a double tap to select. Use a two finger slide up to go to the top of the page.
